mapper.select: SELECT FILE_BATCH_ID , FILE_BATCH_NAME , FILE_BATCH_BANK_ID , FILE_BATCH_TOT_RCORD , FILE_BATCH_TOT_AMT , FILE_BATCH_REJCT_RCORD , FILE_BATCH_APPV_RCORD , FILE_BATCH_APPV_AMT , FILE_BATCH_STUS_ID , FILE_BATCH_REM , FILE_BATCH_CRT_USER_ID , NVL(TO_CHAR(FILE_BATCH_CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'1900-01-01') as FILE_BATCH_CRT_DT, FILE_BATCH_UPD_USER_ID, NVL(TO_CHAR(FILE_BATCH_UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'1900-01-01') as FILE_BATCH_UPD_DT, (CASE WHEN FILE_BATCH_APPV_DT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(TO_CHAR(FILE_BATCH_APPV_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY hh:mi:ss A.M.'),'01-01-1900 AM 00:00:00') ELSE NULL END) AS FILE_BATCH_APPV_DT FROM PAY0245M WHERE FILE_BATCH_ID = #{batchId}

SELECT EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ID, EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_NO, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_NO, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_AMT, ( SELECT MAX(NVL (crc.CUST_CRC_EXPR, '0000')) FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR FROM SAL0001D som JOIN SAL0074D rs ON rs.SALES_ORD_ID = som.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0028D crc ON crc.CUST_CRC_ID = rs.CUST_CRC_ID AND rs.CUST_CRC_ID <> 0 WHERE som.STUS_CODE_ID <> 10 AND rs.MODE_ID = 131 AND som.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 AND rs.BANK_ID IN (19,34,17,28,18,31,16) AND som.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_REF, EXTENT4.CUST_CRC_OWNER, EXTENT3.ISSU_NRIC FROM SAL0152M EXTENT1 JOIN SAL0001D EXTENT2 on EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0074D EXTENT3 on EXTENT3.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0028D EXTENT4 on EXTENT4.CUST_CRC_ID = EXTENT3.CUST_CRC_ID WHERE Extent1.FILE_BATCH_ID = #{fileBatchId} ORDER BY Extent1.FILE_ITM_ID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, Z.* from ( SELECT EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ID, EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_NO, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_NO, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_AMT, ( SELECT MAX(NVL (crc.CUST_CRC_EXPR, '0000')) FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR FROM SAL0001D som JOIN SAL0074D rs ON rs.SALES_ORD_ID = som.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0028D crc ON crc.CUST_CRC_ID = rs.CUST_CRC_ID AND rs.CUST_CRC_ID <> 0 WHERE som.STUS_CODE_ID <> 10 AND rs.MODE_ID = 131 AND som.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 AND rs.BANK_ID IN (19,34,17,28,18,31,16) AND som.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_REF, EXTENT4.CUST_CRC_OWNER, EXTENT3.ISSU_NRIC FROM SAL0152M EXTENT1 JOIN SAL0001D EXTENT2 on EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0074D EXTENT3 on EXTENT3.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0028D EXTENT4 on EXTENT4.CUST_CRC_ID = EXTENT3.CUST_CRC_ID WHERE Extent1.FILE_BATCH_ID = #{fileBatchId} ORDER BY Extent1.FILE_ITM_ID ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageNo} * #{rowCount}) ORDER BY FILE_ITM_ACC_NO ASC) WHERE RNUM > ((#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowCount})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, #{pageNo} as PAGENO, Z.* ,SUM(FILE_ITM_AMT) OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM ROWS between 0 FOLLOWING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS TOT_AMT ,COUNT(FILE_ITM_ID) OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM ROWS between 0 FOLLOWING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS TOT_ITM from ( SELECT EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ID, EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_NO, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_NO, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_AMT, CASE WHEN LENGTH(EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR) < 4 THEN '0000' WHEN TO_DATE(EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR,'MMYY') > SYSDATE THEN EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR ELSE '0000' END FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_REF, EXTENT4.CUST_CRC_OWNER, EXTENT3.ISSU_NRIC FROM SAL0152M EXTENT1 JOIN SAL0001D EXTENT2 on EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0074D EXTENT3 on EXTENT3.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0028D EXTENT4 on EXTENT4.CUST_CRC_ID = EXTENT3.CUST_CRC_ID WHERE Extent1.FILE_BATCH_ID = #{fileBatchId} ORDER BY Extent1.FILE_ITM_ID ) Z
WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageNo} * #{rowCount}) ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC
)
WHERE RNUM > ((#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowCount})

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM SAL0152M EXTENT1 JOIN SAL0001D EXTENT2 on EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0074D EXTENT3 on EXTENT3.SALES_ORD_ID = EXTENT2.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0028D EXTENT4 on EXTENT4.CUST_CRC_ID = EXTENT3.CUST_CRC_ID WHERE Extent1.FILE_BATCH_ID = #{batchId}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM PAY0288D EXTENT1 WHERE Extent1.FILE_BATCH_ID = #{batchId}

SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM ( SELECT FILE_BATCH_CRT_DT CRT_DT FROM PAY0245M WHERE TO_CHAR(FILE_BATCH_CRT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD hh:mi:ss A.M.') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD hh:mi:ss A.M.') AND FILE_BATCH_BANK_ID = 19 AND FILE_BATCH_STUS_ID IN (1,4) UNION SELECT CRT_DT FROM PAY0041D WHERE TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD hh:mi:ss A.M.') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD hh:mi:ss A.M.') AND CTRL_BANK_ID = 19 AND CTRL_STUS_ID IN (1,4) )

SELECT EXTENT1.FILE_BATCH_GRP_ID, EXTENT1.FILE_BATCH_ID, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_STUS_ID, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_NO, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR, EXTENT3.NAME as FILE_ITM_STUS_NAME, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_AMT, (CASE WHEN Extent1.FILE_ITM_APPR_DT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(TO_CHAR(Extent1.FILE_ITM_APPR_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY hh:mi:ss A.M.'),'01-01-1900 AM 00:00:00') ELSE NULL END) AS FILE_ITM_APPR_DT, EXTENT5.USER_NAME as CRT_USER, NVL(TO_CHAR(Extent1.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY hh:mi:ss A.M.'),'01-01-1900 AM 00:00:00') AS FILE_ITM_CRT, EXTENT6.USER_NAME as UPD_USER, (CASE WHEN Extent1.UPD_DT IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(TO_CHAR(Extent1.UPD_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY hh:mi:ss A.M.'),'01-01-1900 AM 00:00:00') ELSE NULL END) AS FILE_ITM_UPD from PAY0288D EXTENT1 left join SYS0038M EXTENT3 on EXTENT3.STUS_CODE_ID = EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_STUS_ID left join SYS0047M EXTENT5 on EXTENT5.USER_ID = EXTENT1.CRT_USER_ID left join SYS0047M EXTENT6 on EXTENT6.USER_ID =EXTENT1.UPD_USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND Extent1.FILE_BATCH_ID = 283 ORDER BY Extent1.FILE_BATCH_GRP_ID;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SAL0211T (ITM_CNT,ITM_ID,APPV_CODE,RESPNS_CODE)
SELECT #{item.itmCnt}, #{item.itmId}, #{item.appvCode}, #{item.respnsCode} FROM DUAL
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,#{pageNo} as PAGENO ,Z.* ,SUM(FILE_ITM_AMT) OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM ROWS between 0 FOLLOWING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS TOT_AMT ,COUNT(FILE_BATCH_GRP_ID) OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM ROWS between 0 FOLLOWING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS TOT_ITM from ( SELECT EXTENT1.FILE_BATCH_GRP_ID, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_NO, EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_AMT,
CASE WHEN EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR = '0000' THEN EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR WHEN LENGTH(EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR) < 4 THEN '0000' WHEN TO_DATE(EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR,'MMYY') > SYSDATE THEN EXTENT1.FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR ELSE '0000' END FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR
( SELECT MAX(NVL(crc.CUST_CRC_EXPR, '0000')) FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR FROM PAY0288D grp JOIN SAL0152M dtl on grp.FILE_BATCH_GRP_ID = dtl.FILE_BATCH_GRP_ID JOIN SAL0001D som ON som.SALES_ORD_ID = dtl.FILE_ITM_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0074D rs ON rs.SALES_ORD_ID = som.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0028D crc ON crc.CUST_CRC_ID = rs.CUST_CRC_ID AND rs.CUST_CRC_ID <> 0 WHERE som.STUS_CODE_ID <> 10 AND rs.MODE_ID = 131 AND som.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 AND rs.BANK_ID IN (19,34,17,28,18,31,16) AND dtl.FILE_BATCH_GRP_ID = EXTENT1.FILE_BATCH_GRP_ID ) AS FILE_ITM_ACC_EXPR
FROM PAY0288D EXTENT1 WHERE Extent1.FILE_BATCH_ID = #{fileBatchId} ORDER BY Extent1.FILE_BATCH_GRP_ID ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageNo} * #{rowCount})) WHERE RNUM > ((#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowCount})
select Count(1) AS TOTAL_ITEM, SUM(CASE WHEN APPV_CODE IS NULL OR APPV_CODE = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) TOTAL_REJECTED, SUM(CASE WHEN APPV_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) TOTAL_APPROVED FROM SAL0211T

SELECT ID , CTRL_FILE_NM , CTRL_DT_FMT , CTRL_FILE_EXT , CTRL_SUB_PATH , CTRL_EMAIL , CTRL_EMAIL_SUBJ , CTRL_EMAIL_TEXT , CTRL_ZIP FROM PAY0289M WHERE CTRL_IS_CRC = 2 AND CTRL_BANK_ID = #{fileBatchBankId} AND DISB = 0 ORDER BY CTRL_SET
